name: Vpushup
how_to_perform:
1. Start in a plank position with your hands shoulder-width apart and your body forming a straight line from head to heels.
2. Engage your core by pulling your belly button towards your spine, and keep your hips level.
3. Bend one knee, keeping it directly under the hip, while keeping the other leg extended behind you.
4. Lower your torso down towards the ground, stretching your arms out in front of the lowered leg. Keep the chest facing downwards.
5. Push back up to the starting position by extending the lowered leg's knee and squeezing the core muscles.
6. Repeat with the other leg, alternating sides throughout the exercise.
short_summary: Vpushups work multiple muscle groups, targeting the shoulders, triceps, and chest while engaging the core for stability.
